column5: Cant they find anything better to do besides getting outside in the fresh air and experiencing the outdoors
Now theres a young fella who has got his priorities straight.
The young lad did well. I gather you must have been the netman for the young star.
Wicked!  Good for him...and you!  Cheers, Ryan
Bah! Youth is wasted on the young.  JF
Reminds me of myself at that age and to think of all the trouble I could have been getting in.  Thanks for posting, great pics. I hope he's now hardcore.
Great to see!
Well done to the lad...Totally awesome  You must be 1 proud dad. WTG
wtg for the young guy....  and huuuge ADA BOY for dad....  Too many parents not even paying attention to their kids extra curricular activities these days...
Nice job!  He won't forget that outing  Paul
By the look of things I'd say you got yourself a fishing partner for life. Congrats to both of you.
Thanks guys.......Im not dad but I am his father figure. Technically im Uncle Dad lol. He goes with me wherever i go pretty much. Hes been Hardcore for quite a while now
Now that's just wrong! He should be at home playing Superbox 820 or some such thing!!!
Yeah I great job. But I'll bet he's out fishing you now.    DSN
LOL
He has his days for sure........he's right on when fishing with a float for anything.
jeeze
What a catch! great job he'll be begging you to be taking him out after a day like that!
He goes thru skunk stretches too and still loves to get back out..........thats a great sign.
Nice!
